author: m.kalinin
content: either is fine with me, slightly in favour of `ExecutionRequest` as it's a succinct name

author: ralexstokes
content:
have we done any testing on devnets with high deposit count under EIP-6110?

there's this PR: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3818

to address some of the concerns, but it seems to bring more complexity to what is already quite a complex fork

an easy win here could be moving some rate-limiting logic to the EL, like EIP-7002

author: ralexstokes
content: (wondering about testing, as some of the concerns come down to performance numbers under high deposit counts)

author: parithosh
content: Could you define high ? We did do deposit tests, but unsure what the threshold is
